Key Match Events: Giancarlo Stanton hit a go-ahead homer in the eighth inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: It was the first playoff game at the K in 3,268 days, since the Royals beat the Mets in Game 2 of the 2015 World Series
Others: The Yankees won despite another frustrating night in the postseason for MVP front-runner Aaron Judge. He went 0 for 4 with a walk, and is now 1 for 11 with only an infield single through three games against the Royals.
